page.title: 09Silver Jubilee
page.content: On June 12th, 1985 Father Breandan McDonald celebrated 25 years in the priesthood, which was of great interest to the local community, and preparations for celebrating this event started as far back as March 1984. A variety of fund-raising events were organized and a Jubilee fund was set up in order that a cheque could be presented to Father to show how much local people thought of him. On Tuesday 11th June Father celebrated his first mass of thanksgiving for his Silver Jubilee, this mass was prepared and read by the Junior 4 children of Holy Family School. Two Hundred and twenty invited guests attended the mass, they included the Mayor and Mayoress of Trafford and some representitives of local parishes and organizations.{
